channel.title: Codes on Nikiforos Pittaras
channel.description: Recent content in Codes on Nikiforos Pittaras

item.title: Code
item.description: Software to survive in development under linux Efficient replacements to the horrible linux man pages, like cheat and tldr A good terminal editor (i.e., not nano) like emacs or vim or more recent alternatives like micro Insta-terminal access, via the embedded terminal in dolphin or the drop-down magic of yakuake Heavy use of bash aliases and scripts for automation Software I develop A video / image classification and description wrapper in python3 and tensorflow, which you can find in my github page
